snippet: The Public Company Accounting Oversight Board said that it found problems with procedures at PricewaterhouseCoopers in 2008 and 2009 and that they had not been remedied.
abstract: Public Company Accounting Oversight Board, regulator for American auditing firms, reports serious problems with procedures at PricewaterhouseCoopers, noting that firm has failed to remedy them.
lead_paragraph: The Public Company Accounting Oversight Board said that it found problems with procedures at PricewaterhouseCoopers in 2008 and 2009 and that they had not been remedied.

headline.seo: PwC’s Audit Procedures Rebuked by Regulator
headline.main: Regulator Expresses Doubts About an Auditor’s Procedures
headline.print_headline: Regulator Expresses Doubts About an Auditor’s Procedures
